mosinstall.name: eventCal Mini
mosinstall.author: Kay Messerschmidt
mosinstall.description: eventCal - The Event Calendar System for Joomla! - Mini Calendar Module

param.name: view
param.label: View
param.description: The sort of view mini eventCal should show up with. Currently, only the whole month view is supported.

param.name: week_startingday
param.label: Starting Day of Week
param.description: The weekday weeks normally start within your country.

param.name: day_chars_count
param.label: Chars for each day
param.description: Specify the number of chars you want displayed for each day name. If fewer then the specified number of chars are displayed, this might be related to your Joomla! configuration for $mosConfig_locale.

param.name: catid
param.label: Categories
param.description: Comma-separated list of eventCal categories. Events from all categories will be shown if this is empty.

param.name: moduleclass_suffix
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.eventcal_mini), this allows individual module styling
